videos.description: LaMelo Ball pushes the pace and throws a pass to Miles Bridges for the alley-oop finish vs. the Pacers.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (LaMelo lobs to Bridges for an alley-oop dunk) 2021/1/29 ESHEET

videos.headline: LaMelo lobs to Bridges for an alley-oop dunk

videos.description: LaMelo Ball cleans up on the glass with a one-handed putback dunk vs. the Pacers.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (LaMelo throws down putback dunk) 2021/1/29 ESHEET

videos.headline: LaMelo throws down putback dunk

videos.description: LaMelo Ball throws ahead to Miles Bridges who spins in the air for the reverse alley-oop finish.
videos.headline: Bridges flushes reverse alley-oop
